content:

inventory=[{"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "netherite_scrap", "quantity": 57, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 24, "index": 23}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 25}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 52, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 26, "index": 34}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "birch_stairs", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 54, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft spruce_stairs, I need to place 6 spruce_planks in a stair-like shape in the crafting grid. The first step is to move one spruce_plank from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1
